content: In what European country can you find the city of Dubrovnik, which served as a filming location for the popular TV series Game of Thrones?

Dubrovnik is actually located in Croatia, which is in Southeast Europe. Croatia is known for its beautiful coastal cities, and Dubrovnik is one of its most famous ones. It's often called the "Pearl of the Adriatic" because of its stunning architecture and picturesque setting along the coast. In the TV series Game of Thrones, Dubrovnik stood in for the fictional city of King's Landing, the capital of the Seven Kingdoms. So, if you're a fan of the show, you might recognize some of the scenes filmed there, like the Red Keep and the bay area. It's fascinating how real-world locations can bring fantasy worlds to life on screen.
